title: Groom gets cold feet on wedding day, family accuses his sister of ruining an 18-year relationship: 'He was literally acting like a 5-year-old'
description: It doesn't seem likely that this family will ever recover after this wedding debacle.The groom had been in an 18-year relationship with his fiancée and had previously gotten into hot water after chickening out of their first engagement three years prior to this go-around (talk about commitment issues!). This time, he hadn't shown up to the altar and was nowhere to be found. Three hours passed when finally the groom's sister received a call from her brother-in-law saying they found the groom at a bar, and he had been acting like a child. The groom's sister decided enough was enough and put him on speaker phone so his fiancée could hear everything he was saying. Let's just say the wedding never came to be.Keep scrolling below for the full story and let us know who you think was in the wrong here. For more stories like this, take a look at this post about two bickering twin sisters.
author: BenWeiss
excerpt: Groom gets cold feet on wedding day, family accuses his sister of ruining an 18-year relationship: 'He was literally acting like a 5-year-old' - The internet has generated a huge amount of laughs from cats and FAILS. And we all out of cats.

html:
It doesn't seem likely that this family will ever recover after this wedding debacle.

The groom had been in an 18-year relationship with his fiancée and had previously gotten into hot water after chickening out of their first engagement three years prior to this go-around (talk about commitment issues!). This time, he hadn't shown up to the altar and was nowhere to be found. Three hours passed when finally the groom's sister received a call from her brother-in-law saying they found the groom at a bar, and he had been acting like a child. The groom's sister decided enough was enough and put him on speaker phone so his fiancée could hear everything he was saying. Let's just say the wedding never came to be.

Keep scrolling below for the full story and let us know who you think was in the wrong here. For more stories like this, take a look at this post about two bickering twin sisters.
